Stages.Text: Materials are needed to fix the bridge, but the messenger going east has disappeared. Go after him, past the south watchtower, and follow the road east.
You met with Oliver, the forester and carpenter. He's been attacked by a gang boss named Randall. You did find the supplies, however - Edgard will want to know about all this.
After Oliver, the forester and carpenter, was attacked by a gang boss named Randall, you finished him off yourself. You did find the supplies, however - Edgard will want to know about that.
